item.title: New AEW Video Game Released
item.description:
Highlights

  • AEW partners with TNT & Immutable X to release the free mobile game Figure Fighters featuring 32 wrestling stars.
  • Figure Fighters features unique visuals and casual gameplay.
  • Players can engage in automatic wrestling matches with special moves and finishers.

All Elite Wrestling ( AEW ) has partnered with TNT Sports and developer Immutable X to bring a new free-to-play wrestling game, AEW Figure Fighters , to mobile phones. The latest game from AEW is available now on both Google Play and the App Store in the United States.

Although founded on January 1, 2019, and quickly rising to become the second-largest professional wrestling promotion in the world, AEW didn't make the jump into the console video game business until June 2023 with the launch of AEW Fight Forever . However, Figure Fighters is actually the fourth mobile game for the wrestling promotion, following the past releases of AEW Casino: Double or Nothing and AEW Elite General Manager in 2020, along with AEW Rise To The Top earlier this year.

Related
AEW Fight Forever Adding WWE Hall of Famer in Season 4

AEW Fight Forever's roster is adding in a wrestler who won 31 titles and made it to the Hall of Fame during his tenure with WWE.

The most obvious thing setting Figure Fighters apart from other wrestling games is its visuals, with all wrestlers being represented by 3D-animated action figure versions of themselves, not unlike the John Cena and Cody Rhodes action figure models in WWE 2K24 . The title is considered a casual mobile game, as wrestling matches will play out automatically after the player sets them up, but players can tap the screen to utilize special moves as they become available on a cooldown timer, in addition to using their finisher once their opponent's health reaches zero.

AEW Figure Fighters Features 32 Wrestling Stars

At launch, AEW Figure Fighters supports a roster comprising 32 different wrestlers. These include popular figures like Chris Jericho, Swerve Strickland, Darby Allin, Bryan Danielson, Dr. Britt Baker, Jon Moxley, Toni Storm, and Orange Cassidy . Players can unlock new wrestlers in a number of ways through in-game play, although in-app purchases are also available. In addition to playing through matches, players also have the ability to upgrade any wrestler on their roster, provided they've collected the necessary resources to do so, which includes improving their in-ring gear as well as boosting the level of their moves and their overall statistics.

The game supports multiple modes of play, including a campaign mode and a one-on-one PvP arena, as well as daily challenges and events, providing multiple ways to earn rewards. And if the game's AEW console counterpart is any benchmark to go by with Fight Forever adding top stars regularly , then Figure Fighters could see some fresh faces added to the game as time goes by.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Earns Incredible Sales Achievement
item.description:
Highlights

  • Red Dead Redemption 2 is the seventh best-selling game worldwide, with 64 million copies sold, outselling iconic titles like Pokemon and Overwatch.
  • Despite its success, fans are upset over the neglect of Red Dead Online and the lack of updates.
  • While the game could have benefited from additional content, Red Dead Redemption 2 remains a classic with stunning details and storytelling.

Red Dead Redemption 2 has experienced a major accomplishment, selling enough copies to become the seventh-most sold game in the entire world. The Red Dead Redemption 2 achievement is an impressive one, and may make fans wonder about what the future holds for the franchise.

While Rockstar Games has put most of its focus in Grand Theft Auto recently, Red Dead Redemption 2 is arguably a masterpiece of a game. The hidden details in RDR 2 continue to surprise players, and the game's massive, sprawling world is still stunning new fans all the time. It may not come as a surprise, then, to learn that Red Dead Redemption 2 is a major sales success for the developer.

Related
GTA 6 Release Window Officially Confirmed

Rockstar Games' highly anticipated Grand Theft Auto 6 finally gets an official release window, which should relieve concerns about potential delays.

Red Dead Redemption 2 is approaching 64 million copies sold, which makes it the seventh-best selling game in the entire world. For comparison, some of the major hitters the title has outsold include Pokemon Red and Blue , Overwatch , mega Switch hit Animal Crossing: New Horizons , and The Witcher 3 . The game has even outperformed the original Super Mario Bros. , cementing its position in gaming history.

While 64 million copies sold is nothing to scoff at, there's still a long way for Red Dead Redemption 2 to go before it could even breach the top 5 best-selling games. Mario Kart 8 and its Deluxe version are in 6th place with 70 million units sold, PUBG is ahead of it with 75 million, and Wii Sports comes in fourth with nearly 83 million copies. The top three titles are Minecraft with a whopping 300 million copies, GTA 5 in second place with 200 million, and EA's version of Tetris with 100 million.

The Neglected Rockstar Game

While Red Dead Redemption 2 deserves its incredible sales record, the realization that it has performed so well yet largely been neglected has fans upset. Red Dead Online 's development has been largely abandoned , with only minor patches and updates coming to the title despite the much older GTA Online still receiving regular updates. Players have also complained about Red Dead Redemption 2 's bugs going unfixed, while others have lamented what expansions or DLC for the game could have done to add additional story. To be fair, GTA 5 also didn't receive any story expansions in the single player game, but that's a sore spot among its community as well, fueling further scorn.

Red Dead Redemption 2 is a classic that's sold extremely well. One can imagine if the title had received content updates and expansion that it would have performed even better. Still, the title is an incredible adventure for anyone who enjoys open world games , old west themes, or those who simply love a good story.

item.title: MultiVersus Details PvE Rifts Mode
item.description:
Highlights

  • MultiVersus details Rifts mode, offering PvE gameplay and adding variety to traditional matches.
  • Rifts mode allows players to collect gems for stat upgrades, incorporate power-ups, and enjoy boss fights and mini-games.
  • Fans hope for impressive roster updates to keep MultiVersus exciting and engaging for players.

MultiVersus is adding a new PvE mode called Rifts. Warner Bros.' crossover fighter MultiVersus has had an interesting history, as the game initially launched in early access and open beta from 2022 to 2023 before going offline. After going quiet for a while, the game was announced as a full release planned for 2024.

Because the game will have essentially launched twice by the end of May, some gamers are concerned about MultiVersus ' ability to stay popular . Many players are still excited about the game and eagerly anticipate its release, but as more fighting games with similar appeal have been released in the time the game has been offline, there may be more competition for the attention of fans of the genre. It appears this has been considered because MultiVersus is adding ways to alter its gameplay formula.

2:26
Related
MultiVersus Reveals Joker Skin and Teases New Characters

A new MultiVersus trailer shows off the Joker's gameplay and a haunting alternate skin, as well as signs of an iconic cartoon trio joining the action.

A new trailer showing off MultiVersus ' Rifts PvE mode has been released. MultiVersus has changed in several ways since its initial launch , including a combat overhaul, and Rifts seems to further distinguish the game from its contemporaries. The mode's appeal is offering a way to play outside of MultiVersus ' traditional competitive PvP mode so that players can enjoy themselves regardless of how skilled they are. Rifts' focus appears to be variety, offering ways to spice up gameplay through boss fights and mini-games. In this mode, gameplay is split up into campaigns called rifts, that offer individual battles and challenges referred to as Nodes. Gameplay in Rifts can be altered through Mutators, which are various types of power-ups, such as reflecting damage.

MultiVersus Unveils New PvE Mode

In Rifts mode, players will be able to collect attack, defense, and utility gems as they win battles. These gems can be upgraded, and further alter gameplay through stat boosts and other passive effects such as incorporating damage and mobility buffs. Rifts mode appears to only be the beginning of some unexpected changes that offer varied gameplay to keep gamers interested. Of course, gamers are hoping for other changes, like consistent updates to MultiVersus' impressive roster of characters .

Regarding the game's cast, plenty of players want to see Barbie added to the MultiVersus roster . In terms of keeping attention on the game, such an impressive addition would be a great way to get gamers hyped. Compared to similar games, one thing that Super Smash Brothers games always had above other releases was impressive cast additions, and now that support for the game is over, there haven't been character announcements that draw in a community on the same scale. Amid all the changes coming to MultiVersus , fans are hoping the game has retained its capacity to impress.

item.title: World of Warcraft: The War Within Lets New Earthen Pick a Backstory
item.description:
Highlights

  • Players can personalize their new Earthen character's backstory during the introductory experience in WoW.
  • Choices include former job, hometown, strengths, and future goals, adding unique flavor to role playing.
  • Similar to previous WoW quests, this feature allows for individuality and personalization similar to other popular MMOs.

World of Warcraft players creating a new Earthen actually get to pick parts of their backstory in the process. Though these choices dont affect anything about the character in the long run, the options provide a unique flavor that many World of Warcraft players will likely love.

The Earthen are the new Allied Race coming in World of Warcraft: The War Within . These Titan-forged folk have a unique culture, new racial abilities, and a different accent than their Dwarven cousins in World of Warcraft .

Related
World of Warcraft Players Uncover How To Unlock Earthen Allied Race

During Alpha testing, World of Warcraft players discover the numerous steps required to unlock the Earthen Allied Race in the War Within expansion.

However, the Earthen have another feature that sets them apart from any other race in World of Warcraft . During the introductory experience for new Earthen characters in World of Warcraft , players have the opportunity to choose aspects of their backstory and personality. While these choices dont influence the game in any tangible way, they do provide an awesome way for role players to individualize their new heroes. World of Warcraft fan and the original "Red Shirt Guy" Ian Bates even noticed certain classes got unique options when choosing their characters former job, sharing some examples on Twitter.

WoW: The War Within Earthen Backstory Options

  • The original job the character did when they were last awakened, which includes several class-specific options.
  • Where in Khaz Algar they used to live.
  • If the character wants to be reassigned to a different job.
  • What their greatest strengths and skills are.
  • Where they want to go in Azeroth.
  • Who they want to become.

Technically, this isnt the first time World of Warcraft has done something like this. Both the Orc and Draenei Heritage quests from World of Warcraft: Dragonflight let players make individualized choices, with the former offering membership in a clan, and the latter letting characters create a memory stone based on their class and history. Likewise, Night Elf fans got the chance to choose a custom offering while unlocking their missing Heritage set in Patch 10.1.7, and everyone got to choose where a former Primalist enemy was buried during a special epilogue quest in Patch 10.2.7.

Nevertheless, fans love the level of individuality World of Warcraft gives players while creating their Earthen. Many likened it to the customizable origin stories in Guild Wars 2 , or the personalized dialogue options of Final Fantasy 14 , both of which are lauded by their respective players for their role playing potential. Story enthusiasts were delighted by these options, and hope World of Warcraft continues to emphasize the RP in MMORPG by innovating with this system elsewhere in the future.

item.title: Rumor: Genshin Impact Leak Teases Pyro Archon Character
item.description:
Highlights

  • A Genshin Impact leak hints at Pyro Archon having two forms: Medium Female and Tall Female.
  • The Natlan leak suggests new characters like Emilie and Xbalanque might join the game.
  • Story leaks may not always be accurate; speculation on Pyro Archon's role is ongoing.

A recent Genshin Impact leak offers information about the story in Natlan, including some intriguing details about its Pyro Archon. With Version 4.6 introducing the final Fontaine map expansion, Genshin Impact players have been eagerly awaiting news about the next region of Teyvat. With only Natlan and Snezhnaya left, Genshin Impact 's overarching story, introduced in its intro cinematic, is steadily approaching the finale. While it's become obvious that the conflict between Celestia and Khaenri'ah will come to the forefront once again, the road to getting there remains elusive.

According to recent rumors about Natlan in Genshin Impact , the first few 5-star characters from the new region will be two Catalyst units and a Claymore wielder. Their names, and the exact order of their release, remain unknown, but the Pyro Archon is expected to be the 5-star Pyro Claymore character coming in Version 5.2. Emilie, a Dendro 5-star from Fontaine, is also expected to be released in Natlan, while Genshin Impact fans strongly suspect that Xbalanque is a Dragon Sovereign of Natlan who will be one of the Catalyst units.

8:40
Related
Best Games To Play If You Liked Genshin Impact

miHoYo's Genshin Impact is overflowing with content, but if fans want a change of pace, they should check out these other games.

However, new information provided by Ark and Seele Leaks claims that Natlan will introduce the Electro Sovereign in a small role, while also featuring two distinct forms of the Pyro Archon in Genshin Impact . It's important to note that story leaks are the most unreliable by nature, as information is liable to be misinterpreted or even changed during development. Famously, Fontaine's Ousia and Pneuma mechanics were misunderstood as a civil war between two factions one led by Navia, and the other by Furina.

The Pyro Archon Could Be Two Separate Characters in Genshin Impact

The leak states that the Pyro Archon has a Medium Female and Tall Female form, with the former having been shown as concept art in early 2024. The golden mask, red and white dress, and indigo feathers are key aspects of her design, with the feathers specifically having a visual tie to the Electro Sovereign, who is meant to be an unplayable character. The other form wears a red-and-black hat with crimson feathers, has flame pupils, and her long hair ends in a low ponytail with a fiery gradient color. White feathers adorn her chest, and she wears a red cloak with golden trimmings. Given the design of previous Archons in Genshin Impact , it's highly probable that the second form described is the Pyro Archon's playable model.

There is also another possibility to consider: the two Genshin Impact characters are separate entities altogether. As was the case with Fontaine's story leaks, only the raw information ended up being accurate. Since Natlan's story theme is rumored to revolve around rebirth and redemption, the seat of the Pyro Archon could be trading places over the course of its story. The leak also confirmed new skins for Amber and Sucrose, which have been rumored as having been worked on since at least 2022. Though it remains to be seen how the Archon Quests will play out in Natlan, it's shaping up to be a wild journey.
